title: Mumble rap
summary: Mumble rap (often referred to as "SoundCloud rap"[6]) is a loosely defined[4] microgenre[7] of hip hop that largely spread on the online audio distribution platform SoundCloud in the 2010s.[8] The term implies a mumbling or unclear vocal delivery by artists, and may generally refer to rappers who do not share the genre's traditional emphasis on lyricism.[9]
